thread.section_title: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London ExCel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Not perfect but will do
thread.title_full: Not perfect but will do - Review of DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London ExCel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Peter L
title: Not perfect but will do
text:
Stayed here for one night before a conference in the excel the next day. Decided to make an evening of it.
I came straight from work so was missing a few essentials such as toothbrush, razor etc. Staff on request supplied me with these amenities.
I got to pick my room before I got there so went for the city airport view. Not only can you see the runway and planes taking off but you cannot hear a thing.
The room was very clean and tidy and perfect for its main custom who are business people on short stays.
However it doesn't get full marks from me. This is because the air con unit was making an annoying ticking noise intermittently. It wasn't enough to complain about but enough for me to write about it.
We ordered breakfast to the room but only one because I didn't want to eat. Even though we clearly marked this on the sheet, breakfast for 2 arrived and I was charged for it.
Lastly, there is no express check out. The paperwork can all be done when you check in but something as simple as having a bowl to leave your room key in as you leave doesn't exist. I find it hard to believe that the majority of stayers don't want to method and when I had to queue up just to hand my key back in, it kind of defeated the point of the paperwork I done at check in.
So all in all it was great however I have listed the above small niggly points due to the amount of competition in that area. And that's coming from a loyal Hilton stayer.
